question.body: Which of the following hormones is not properly matched with one of its target organs?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Cholecytokinin is produced by the duodenal mucosa and stimulates the liver, pancreas, and gall bladder.
Correct. Gastrin targets the stomach, pancreas and liver.
Incorrect. The hormone secretin does target the cells of the stomach and pancreas.
Incorrect. The hormone somatostatin does target the stomach and small intestine.
